channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: Breakingviews - 中国小米走上苹果没有走过的路
item.description:
Breakingviews - China's Xiaomi embarks on Apple's road not taken https://t.co/ozBeG13EuY https://t.co/ozBeG13EuY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 苹果公司表示，为了遵守欧盟的《数字市场法案》，它将允许软件开发商通过自己的网站或在线市场直接销售他们的应用程序。点击此处了解更多信息：
item.description:
In compliance with the European Union's Digital Markets Act, Apple says it will allow software developers to sell their apps directly through their own websites or online marketplaces. Read more here: https://t.co/CAL563wljA pic.twitter.com/D2DZvAlo4a

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 瑞士交易所运营商 SIX 因减值损失 11.5 亿美元
item.description:
Swiss exchange operator SIX posts $1.15 bln loss on impairments https://t.co/KTylkeCxXR pic.twitter.com/9wNpUI0rvC

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 官方数据显示，英国经济在 2023 年下半年陷入浅度衰退后，于 2024 年初恢复增长，为首相苏纳克（Rishi Sunak）在预计今年举行的大选前松了一口气。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Britain's economy returned to growth at the start of 2024, offering some relief to Prime Minister Rishi Sunak ahead of an election expected this year, after it entered a shallow recession in the second half of 2023, official data showed. More here: https://t.co/QxLnvLgPuO

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 增长点地产公司预计年度可分配收入减少
item.description:
Growthpoint Properties expects lower annual distributable income https://t.co/CmQuoLSSkI pic.twitter.com/JhCFmODwh3

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美罗银行在最后一刻推出拯救方案后，年度亏损额有所减少
item.description:
Metro Bank posts smaller annual loss after last-minute rescue package https://t.co/cDnTQSxGoo pic.twitter.com/SYBUAQMoLR

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国商务部长表示，美国企业热衷于实现供应链多样化，为泰国投资 "增效
item.description:
US firms keen to diversify supply chains, 'supercharge' Thai investments, says US commerce secretary https://t.co/fmFvgsPv2r pic.twitter.com/bi0loC4D3j

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 投资者和分析师认为，HelloFresh 需要削减成本，阻止餐包用户外流，以提高利润，重振股价。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
HelloFresh needs to cut costs and stem an exodus of meal-kit subscribers to boost profits and revive its share price, according to investors and analysts, who remain to be convinced by a plan to expand its fledging ready-meals arm. More here: https://t.co/VvWt69pzxE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 德国 HQ Capital 聘请 Michael Hu 领航亚洲发展之路
item.description:
Germany's HQ Capital taps Michael Hu to steer Asia growth story https://t.co/Exh8JbrUkl pic.twitter.com/hEmIC7oxhB

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 一年前，瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）濒临倒闭，这一恐慌导致欧洲银行股价暴跌，违约保险成本飙升。以下图表描绘了复苏之路，以及未来的一些潜在隐患
item.description:
A year ago, Credit Suisse was teetering on the brink of collapse, a scare that sent European bank shares tumbling and the cost of insuring against default soaring. Here are graphics charting the road to recovery, as well as some potential pitfalls ahead https://t.co/NlzyqpGkLO

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 法国巴黎银行第四季度业绩疲软，宣布削减更多成本
item.description:
BNP Paribas announces more cost cuts after weak fourth quarter https://t.co/XhHq4XOyen pic.twitter.com/dNUSkw9NEo

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 全球房地产业在经历了十多年来最严重的暴跌之后，正在努力寻找乐观的理由，开发商和投资者都在谈论复苏的前景--只是还没有完全复苏。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The global real estate industry is scrabbling around for reasons to be optimistic in the grip of its biggest crash in more than a decade, with developers and investors talking up the prospect of a recovery - just not quite yet. More here: https://t.co/UzgxcTiSv0

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在中国南方某城市，前财务工作者雷晓宇因拖欠房贷而被追债者追逐，她不再接听电话，试图拖延不可避免的命运。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Chased by debt collectors over a mortgage delinquency in a southern Chinese city, former finance worker Lei Xiaoyu no longer answers her phone as she tries to delay the inevitable. More here: https://t.co/PUncZIYsQV pic.twitter.com/Wd5hQwrDWg

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 地产巨头在戛纳寻找市场转机的线索
item.description:
Property titans seek clues in Cannes for market turnaround https://t.co/hWTRF08nhk pic.twitter.com/tbbz9jvcu2

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 凯西-费斯勒（Casey Fiesler）等分析家质疑，美国国会议员对 TikTok 的关注是否掩盖了一个更大的问题，即如何监管一个多年来一直存在数据隐私和潜在操纵问题的行业。
item.description:
Analysts like Casey Fiesler are questioning whether US Congress members’ focus on TikTok is obscuring the larger question of how to regulate an industry in which concerns about data privacy and potential manipulation have been rife for years https://t.co/j1mJj61qk1 pic.twitter.com/aS8DbEK9tS

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 尼基塔-米南科夫（Nikita Minenkov）的欧亚物流集团（Eurasia Logistics Group）是受益于对华贸易急剧增长的多家俄罗斯企业之一，因为乌克兰入侵和制裁实施后，西方企业放弃了俄罗斯市场。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Nikita Minenkov's Eurasia Logistics Group is one of multiple Russian businesses to benefit from a sharp uptick in trade with China, since Western firms abandoned the Russian market after the invasion of Ukraine and the imposition of sanctions. More here: https://t.co/bNvraIntE2

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 瑞士信贷倒闭一年后欧洲银行艰难复苏
item.description:
European banks' bumpy recovery a year after Credit Suisse collapse https://t.co/paClHS38B8 pic.twitter.com/xxdqbZ455p

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 观看：从萨姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）和三位新董事重返 OpenAI 董事会，到芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）被三位作家起诉，我们将为您盘点本周人工智能革命的重大新闻。
item.description:
WATCH: From Sam Altman's return to OpenAI’s board along with three new directors, to chipmaker Nvidia being sued by three authors, we round up the week's big stories from the AI revolution pic.twitter.com/sT2BzAWuCz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 两位消息人士称，国际货币基金组织的一个代表团即将抵达巴基斯坦，对一项 30 亿美元的备用安排进行第二次也是最后一次审查。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
An International Monetary Fund mission is arriving in Pakistan for a second and last review of a $3 billion standby arrangement, two sources said. More here: https://t.co/M9fIV9hINX

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 据新闻网站报道，碧桂园在岸债券持有人尚未收到息票付款
item.description:
Country Garden onshore bondholders have not received coupon payment, news site reports https://t.co/JN9aWIlFYW pic.twitter.com/pt7iUedrOI

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：该公司表示，越来越多的 Reddit 新用户来自谷歌等搜索引擎。@AnitaRamaswamy 解释了为什么这对社交媒体平台来说是个风险，因为它计划很快上市
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: A growing number of new Reddit users came from search engines like Google, the company says. @AnitaRamaswamy explains why it is a risk for the social media platform, as it plans to go public soon pic.twitter.com/TKFmjmFS4J

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 市场：结束银行 "窗口指导 "的举措或将重塑美国回购市场
item.description:
In the Market: Bid to end bank 'window dressing' may reshape US repo market https://t.co/9mqrKrNTB6 pic.twitter.com/GPxO3qfyct

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 根据新加坡中央银行的一项调查，经济学家们上调了新加坡 2024 年的经济增长预期，认为外部增长好于预期是经济增长的最大动力。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Economists have upgraded Singapore's 2024 growth forecast, according to a survey by the country's central bank, with better-than-expected external growth seen as the top upside driver for the economy. More here: https://t.co/UQrxn15nOj

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 普华永道澳大利亚公司表示，将再裁员 329 人，这是继一名前合伙人泄露政府税收计划的全国性丑闻后进行的重大重组的一部分。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
PwC Australia said it would cut an additional 329 jobs, part of a major restructuring that follows a national scandal in which a former partner leaked government tax plans. More here: https://t.co/9a91FCZtDX

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 丰田公司同意为工厂工人加薪，这是丰田公司 25 年来最大的一次加薪，这增强了人们的预期，即丰厚的加薪将为央行下周进行关键的政策调整提供回旋余地。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Toyota agreed to give factory workers their biggest pay increase in 25 years, heightening expectations that bumper pay raises will give the central bank leeway to make a key policy shift next week. More here: https://t.co/Sq1FhfouG3

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 德国 HQ Capital 聘请 Michael Hu 领航亚洲发展之路

item.title: 日本《每日新闻》称，丰田公司已同意完全满足其工会提出的年度加薪要求，因为日本顶级企业在与工会的年度会谈中很可能提出大幅加薪。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Toyota has agreed to fully meet its union's request for annual pay increases, the Mainichi newspaper said, as top Japanese companies look likely to offer sizeable salary hikes at annual talks with unions. More here: https://t.co/G5Zyf8eDqZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国航空运营商警告说，由于波音公司更多喷气式飞机的交付延迟，他们增加运力的计划受到质疑，波音公司的安全危机对航空业的打击正在加剧。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
US air carriers warned that their plans to increase capacity were in doubt due to more jet delivery delays from Boeing, as the hit to the airline industry from the planemaker's safety crisis worsens. More here: https://t.co/HSL0GNN38F

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 观看：从为什么谷歌的人工智能聊天机器人 "双子座"（Gemini）不会回答有关全球选举的问题，到在#奥林匹克运动会#期间确保巴黎的安全。以下是本周人工智能革命的重大新闻汇总
item.description:
WATCH: From why Google’s AI chatbot Gemini won't answer questions about global elections, to keeping Paris safe during the #Olympics. Here is a round up of the week's big stories from the AI revolution pic.twitter.com/hVi5lD9Gyi

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024
